home.text: Your plane has crashed and you are the only survivor. You are in a dense jungle and must choose your path wisely to survive...

start.text: The plane is smokey and filled with debrit when you come to. You head hurts but you appear to be uninjured.

options.B: Get out of seat and go towards the back exit
options.C: Go to the closer exit in front of me

supplies.text: You climb through the rubble of the plane looking for anything that could help you. You find one of the pilot's bags; inside it is a bowie knife.

back_exit.text: You get out of your seat and climb towards the back of the plane. You find an emergency exit partially blocked by debris.

front_exit.text: You go to the closer exit in front of you and push open the door. The jungle looms before you.

exit_plane.text: You manage to exit the plane and step into the dense jungle. The sounds of wildlife surround you.

options.B: Follow a small stream you see to your right

jungle_path.text: You step cautiously into the jungle. After a short walk through dense vegitation you see a stone structure breaking through the top of the canopy. There also appears to be a clearing to your right and a stream.

ruins_approach.text: You approach the ancient ruin, its stone walls covered in vines. The entrance is dark and foreboding.

options.B: Circumvent the ruin and explore further

stream_path.text: You follow the stream. It appears to be fresh water and you drink as much as you can. After you notice a path leading deeper into the jungle and footprints nearby.

inside_ruins.text: Inside the ruin, it's dark and musty. As you move further in, you hear mechanisms clicking.

forest_explore.text: You decide to explore the forest further. After a while, you find another entrance to the ruin.

footprints_follow.text: Following the footprints, you eventually encounter a group of indigenous people. They seem wary of you.

stream_follow.text: Sticking to the stream path, you find more signs of civilization but also potential danger.

booby_trap.text: As you proceed, you trigger a booby trap. Spears shoot out from the walls, and you are fatally wounded.

exit_ruins.text: You turn back and exit the ruin, deciding to explore elsewhere.

forest_death.text: As you continue exploring the forest, you are bitten by a venomous snake and succumb to the poison.

indigenous_meet.text: You manage to communicate with the indigenous people. They offer to help you find safety.

hide_observe.text: You hide and observe them. After a while, they move on, leaving behind some useful supplies.

civilization_find.text: You find an abandoned village with some useful supplies. However, it looks like it might be a dangerous area.

safe_path.text: The indigenous people guide you through the jungle safely. You eventually reach a rescue team and find safety.

supplies_find.text: You find useful supplies left behind by the indigenous people. This increases your chances of survival.

indigenous_follow.text: You follow the indigenous people from a distance but get lost and succumb to the elements.

village_search.text: While searching the village, you trigger a hidden booby trap and are fatally injured.

end.text: Thank you for playing! Press Continue to exit.
